website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice with user-friendly features.
pros: Offers features for comfort, including a foam grip and coated handle tip
Aerodynamic design with broom head brace offers effortless control

customer_reviews.title: Finally a broom that will last!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 kids and have never been able to find a broom that can hold up for more than a few months. The handle always got bent and then broke clean off. This broom is the first one I've found that addresses the major weaknesses I've seen with brooms. The handle is reinforced steel and is the strongest handle I've ever seen. I love the cushioned support that is placed in exactly the right spot. The supports on each side of the broom head keep it from coming off which was another problem I struggled with. This mom is very happy that my search for a broom to meet my large family's needs is over!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Anderson

customer_reviews.title: How great can a broom be? This one is. A full priced review
customer_reviews.text: Sure, it is hard to rave about something as basic as a broom. But this one is engineered so well, I just have to tell you. The bristles apture minutia, while the very trong but light pole makes easy work for the user. Thickly padded handles reduce effort and friction. The design rinses in a garned hose very well, and dries immediately. We live on a farm, and this is one tool that gets used fast (and sometimes doesn't return) due to great performance. treat yourself today. We bought this at full price and so this is an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie DeCesarisTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Your broom search is over!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this broom very much so far but from the minute I got it, I was impressed. Impressed by a broom you say? Yes! It's a tad bit heavier then most brooms (not much) but the handle is solid which makes the whole thing sturdier to work with. And the bristles are compact with enough rigidity to sweep just about anything yet pliable enough to not stir up the dust.This would be a broom I would expect to be used everyday or quite frequently. Even if you only sweep once in a while, I'd have a hard time believing that it won't be around for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom. I purchased it to sweep the wood floors in my home. We have a dog that sheds a lot. I like that the fur doesn't clump and stick to the end of the broom.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sold me a used or just damaged product?
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because mine came with dents and the powder coat was scratched off in some areas and the metal bracket was bent and I had to bend it back to attach the broom head to the handle. Other than that, it seems like a sturdy broom. I bought this to replace a quickie broom handle a family member ruined when they used it to epoxy their garage. It had the foam handle which made it comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyJ

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use
customer_reviews.text: The piece connecting the broom handle to the brush broke under light strain on the first use. It's particularly annoying because a broom isn't exactly an easy item to return - I would've been better off going to the hardware store. Pick a sturdier broom.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I just got it today, couldn't put it down, by far the best broom I've ever used! And I've been a janitor, too. I'm so tired of cheap crappy brooms, I'm too old to keep buying disposable junk over & over again. This is like a Mercedes-Benz, really well engineered & advanced design. This is a really nice quality tool, especially for the $. I'm so impressed I just bought 3 more today, no kidding. And I'm probably going to buy one for my Mom too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Simon Willams

customer_reviews.title: finally a broom that is built to last
customer_reviews.text: love this heavy duty guy! so sick of wimpy brooms that do not sweep up rice, pasta, or anything other than dried cheerios. this is a great broom. it is heavy duty and therefore heavier than other brooms, but who cares, it does the job and it even fits our stand up dust pan that we have from our last weak broom.
customer_reviews.author: DMV Mom

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty, holds up well, quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 261019 Angle Broom on Amazon one month short of three years ago. It has held up well. We use it to sweep sand/debris outside on the pavers, in the garage, and the tiles in the home. The broom itself is a little heavy and tall. Overall worth the $33+ I paid for it three years ago. Photos attached are it's current state.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonese

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Broom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking “this is way too much money for a broom” but I really like this thing. It’s light, comfortable and works awesome! I’ve got a cleaning business and so I’m sweeping every single day and need a great broom-didn’t notice how crappy my last one was until I bought this thing. Love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JNizzle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome job on my wodden floors, this broom will last you a long time. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Bristles didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of March. By July it was unusable as the bristles have gottne completely flattened and tangled. This is extraordinary given it was simply regular household use. I can't believe I'm buying another broom again so soon!
customer_reviews.author: C. Severino

customer_reviews.title: best broom ever
customer_reviews.text: Wow...best broom ever! After using this broom, I threw away all my other brooms. I'm beyond happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: P & T

customer_reviews.title: Strong handle
customer_reviews.text: I keep breaking the handles I sweep almost every day. Its being used for outdoor use, on a decent size property (drive way, side walk, walk way, steps) What I like is the sturdy handle since that is what I usually break/bend, the bristles are nor here or there. (but mind you i dont flip up when i store it)
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Z.

customer_reviews.title: I love this broom
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom. The handle is so nice and comfortable . It has a very nice wide angel that sweeps a lot of stuff at once. I cut my sons hair and it swept up in one pass. It took me days to decide on a broom and I'm so glade I bought this on.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane S. Bassford

customer_reviews.title: nice broom. love the cushions on the handle
customer_reviews.text: nice broom. love the cushions on the handle. Bought it for outside work. It's nicely balanced - not too heavy. Works great in the yard, however bristles could probably be a little stiffer for outside work. I'm sure it would be perfect for indoor sweeping
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps well, but a bit awkward.
customer_reviews.text: This sweeps well. Strong bristles grab dirt, dust, dog fur without scattering everything about. But this is quite a bit heavier than a standard kitchen broom, and so not as nimble--it's really more a utility broom. And there is no opening at the top from which to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanilla Ice Cream

customer_reviews.title: Will last for many years!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent broom. I use this broom indoors. It is not flimsy and very easy to use. It sweeps up food and dust particles easily. I just love it. The handle is substantial but not heavy. The bristles are nice and don’t fall out when using. I recommend this broom.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: Strongly dislike this broom. The broom hairs are too bendy/flexible it is hard to sweep things up especially any dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Linsaym.1212

customer_reviews.title: Good Design
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of sweeping. Seeds, pellets, fallen parrot feathers, dust bunnies. It is hard to find a broom that is comfortable to handle AND does a satisfactory sweep of the floor. I will order this exact broom again and again. It really fits my needs because it has fine feather bristles and thicker stiffer bristles combined.
customer_reviews.author: RoknRolMom

customer_reviews.title: GREAT outdoor/construction broom
customer_reviews.text: Good OUTDOOR or construction broom. Not suitable for indoors. Bristles too tough.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great broom!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable grip, doesn't slip out of hands, light weight. The angle of bristles makes for easy comfortable use. Picks up all the dirt. Extremely happy with product!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely  love this boom
customer_reviews.text: I received this fast and in perfect shape and upon receiving it I felt the urge to sweep my entire house so I did it felt great to hold with the comfort grips and picked up dirt and dust better then any broom I've ever owned and with 2 kids I need it and it help up to sweeping so far I am in love!!!
customer_reviews.author: crista

customer_reviews.title: The best broom ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best broom I have ever used. Period. It may be more expensive for a broom, but it is sure worth it. Very well built, made of mostly metal, not plastic. Metal is thick, so it won't get bent easily. Particles don't get trapped in the bristles, so that is a plus. Definitely buy this broom! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Best broom ever
customer_reviews.text: This broom is the best broom I've ever had. There is a soft foam grip and the angled brush with 2 types of bristles works great. Comfortable to use. It cleans up dust, cat hair, and everything else very well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Soft bristles catch even the finest dust. Angle works into corners and along baseboards. Just what I'd been hunting for!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Coles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Well sized
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through several brooms in the past 6 months, and this one is a keeper. Sturdy. Well sized. Dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing broom. The bristles are great. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RistyKa

customer_reviews.title: Clean sweep
customer_reviews.text: Great broom! This is the second one I have purchased. There was nothing wrong with the first one. I would rather pay a little more if it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbagum

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice broom. I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice broom. I like it. I don't know that I'm convinced it does much more than any other broom for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnabun

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great little broom for tasks around the house. I use it for lawn care, moving stuff around and general upkeep. It’s sturdy and I’m yet to have issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eli H.

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to clean up during renovation. we have replaced the flooring in three bedrooms and it is all worn already. i do not feel the price justifies the quality. i would buy these item again if it was cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Alena Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Good outside broom/ Not good for inside
customer_reviews.text: This would make a good outside broom, but for a kitchen, it is too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, I had construction going on for 6 months & this took a beating but still durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom for garage and decks
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty outdoor deck broom that gets into corners, lightweight and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: After using not so happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: Ends of broom frayed so much. Needs a hook to hang. Not as good as the reviews say. Had to buy another mfg. broom.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom, gets into all the small, angled crevices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: This broom will probably outlast me! It is really heavy duty. But, it is weighty compared to most brooms. The brush part is high quality and effective.
customer_reviews.author: ramonajeffery

customer_reviews.title: Not for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitchen, and it is way to large and heavy. I'd say better suited for garage or patio use. I'm getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great broom. Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Great broom. Reasonably priced. The packaging that they arrived in (I ordered two) was kind of ridiculous but the choice was Amazon's, not mine. Broom is durable and works very well. Not sure what else I can say.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Diehard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built and solid - works great thus far no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: PemPines

customer_reviews.title: Great broom. has foam around the handle to prevent ...
customer_reviews.text: Great broom. has foam around the handle to prevent the blisters I sometimes can get from crappy brooms. very sturdy, sweeps well. a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: . . . AsISeeEm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good broom. I've had it for about a year and no fraying
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the packaging was bad and the end that screws in the broom was broke
customer_reviews.author: Mo Mo

customer_reviews.title: Love this broom!
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom! It works sooooo well! I have it in the kitchen and it holds up really nice. The grips are fantastic. Great quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best broom I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best broom I've ever owned. I'm glad I read so many reviews, because this has lived up to it. I can't anything that hasn't been said, other than it's the best money I've ever spent on a cleaning tool.
customer_reviews.author: glorybe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing broom!! Love it! Very sturdy and it will last me a long time! Highly recommend!1
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda R. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice and simple broom
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice and simple broom. The extra cost is worth it as the item is of higher quality than similar brooms
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: The Right Broom
customer_reviews.text: Who knew having the right broom would make such a difference? I do now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this broom. It seems to be well made with a long handle which I appreciate. I
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great broom feels sturdy, I use it out on my deck and it does a nice job of sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: bizyone

customer_reviews.title: THE broom
customer_reviews.text: The perfect broom. Combined it with the Carlisle pan for an unbeatable combination.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy does not break
customer_reviews.text: Great Broom - does job well, sturdy, I usually break the brooms.
customer_reviews.author: FRED DILO

customer_reviews.title: good design
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and will designed broom. I like the rubber in the middle that makes it comfortable and non slip.
customer_reviews.author: Leen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and efficient broom - the grip handle is great.
customer_reviews.author: Billycasey

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a broom on line, but after reading the reviews about the Black & Decker 261019 Angle Broom I took a big chance and ordered two. I am so very pleased with these brooms. They sweep up the finest dirt, and leave nothing behind. I also like the cushioning on the handle. It is comfortable, and makes it easy to keep your grip. I highly recommend this broom as it truly outshines any broom I have every used.
customer_reviews.author: SmtShopper

customer_reviews.title: okay for a deck but not good for paved driveway
customer_reviews.text: not so ideal for outdoors, okay for a deck but not good for paved driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Jangkyu

customer_reviews.title: Best Broom Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best broom I have ever owned. No dust left behind. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick dirt up well bristles are to stiff. It does appear to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: George Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I like one that I bought from the large home repair ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an OK broom however, I like one that I bought from the large home repair stores better....
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Sturdy handle. Definitely doesn't feel like it's going to fall apart, even after daily of use. Does it's job well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: terrible- nearly immediately bristles splayed, not enough friction in bristles to sweep well. avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hendrie-Marais

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best broom I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how bad my old broom was until i used this Black & Decker Angle broom, which picked up more dust than I imagined was on my wood floors. I was able to sweep into corners easily, the broom is a good height and it was easy to hold. i'm sorry I didn't purchase it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: asiana

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned three of these brooms. One pieced back together from old parts. I used the first handle with the third brush. These are great brooms but on the newest versions the threaded end is the weak link and breaks under stress. I live in Alaska and the cold can also make parts brittle. I mention the first handle as this one was made to have a tighter tolerance and makes over tightening (which can snap the plastic threads on the handle) near impossible as rotating the handle to over tighten is difficult. (Orange colored) (grey handled proved to fail.) Thanks,. I will still purchase this broom as it is light weight and all brooms wear anyway.
customer_reviews.author: g doodle

customer_reviews.title: great outdoor broom
customer_reviews.text: This is a little on the heavier side and seems to work best on outdoor surfaces (i.e. pavement). I was hoping it would be my indoor broom but the bristles dont work as well on hardwood floors. Not what I was looking for but still worked great outside.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria O

customer_reviews.title: The broom to end all brooms!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's monsoon season in Arizona, and that brings with it mounds of very fine red dirt and sand piled up on my patio, driveway, and the walkway leading to my front door. All flat surfaces are covered in it. I've tried every kind of broom I can buy in a store, and all they do is make brush marks through the dirt - it's simply too fine to be swept up. The first two strokes I took with this broom picked up ALL the fine dust and sand in it's path! I am so happy!!! It arrives already assembled, is well constructed, and a nice weight. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn-ette Y.

customer_reviews.title: Man-broom
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, women could love this, too, but for a guy, a broom by Black and Decker should automatically make sweeping a little more macho, haha. And this thing is comfortable, durable, sweeps everything, and with the rubber tipped handle, you can rest it on a wall with less trouble keeping it up. Pair it with the O-Cedar Anti-Static Premium broom with the little rubber teeth on the side for hair removal (my dog sheds badly), and you are set.
customer_reviews.author: NJ_Eric

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to use and does a fine job
customer_reviews.text: I have hard floors throughout our home. We live in a dry dusty area, and I have to sweep certain rooms every day.It took me. a long time looking at many brooms, and reading reviews before I picked this one, and I am very happy with my choice. it does a fine job sweeping, and the grips are in just the right place and are comfortable to use. The broom is also just the right size
customer_reviews.author: Jeannieg

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy broom
customer_reviews.text: I was assuming this would come disassembled with probably a two-part handle, but was instead greeted by a single assembled broom in a box almost big enough to climb into. After filling my entire recycling bin with the packing materials I ended up liking the broom. Nice diameter handle. Good bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Gram Z

customer_reviews.title: Love this broom
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom. I have nothing bad to say about it. I really like the size of it and the grips are so comfortable. If I ever need to replace our downstairs broom I will be getting another one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lino412

customer_reviews.title: Black & Decker angle broom
customer_reviews.text: I needed a broom with soft bristles for a more gentle sweeping application, this is exactly what I wanted. Someone looking for a broom suitable for heavier duty cleaning would probably be better off with something with stiffer bristles, but for my particular needs this broom is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mosso

customer_reviews.title: they like these the best and it is now our standard ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our employees; they like these the best and it is now our standard broom of choice in our facility.
customer_reviews.author: theChivefan

customer_reviews.title: Great broom. So glad that I went with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great broom. So glad that I went with the more expensive broom. The price really mattered on this purchase. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: amikns717

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but a bit heavier than I need for household use. Better for a garage.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: A really great broom
customer_reviews.text: At the end of the day a broom can't do much more than sweep, but this broom makes the task almost a pleasure. The grip is just squishy enough to be comfortable, and the bristles sweep up everything in their path on linoleum, tile and cement equally well.
customer_reviews.author: R Rael

customer_reviews.title: Great outside broom
customer_reviews.text: Not stiff enough to use on semi-packed snow but good for leaves etc. The handle grip is nice as is the angle to the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: M.Clifford

customer_reviews.title: its a broom
customer_reviews.text: been using this pretty regularly for a few months. works great, no signs of wear. gets all the dog hair on my tile floor into a pile and I can just vac it up
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smaha

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well built. The bristles are flexible and the handle is strong. I like the cushion grips on the handle also.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle and really gathers up little crumbs with ease.. also the angle of the brush is really helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Pajuelo

customer_reviews.title: Like the extra length
customer_reviews.text: Like the extra length. Regular sized brooms are hard on the backs of folks who are taller than 6 feet. This one really makes a difference. Good grips and also "just right" bristles.
customer_reviews.author: baper

customer_reviews.title: Superior Broom!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom!!! The bristles are made of the highest quality material. It does not look like it will fray. It is flexible yet brisk. The shape is superior. The cushioned handle so comforting. Very sturdy! I am thrilled with it because it sweeps so efficiently on my hard wood floors. I have been looking for a good broom for several years...yeah finally found one! I just got it today. I will do a follow up review later.
customer_reviews.author: Brad and Jodi Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I love this broom It really does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom It really does a good job. The grip is comfortable and it is very solidly made. I was afraid that the grips on the handle wouldn't be useful because I am fairly short (5'1") but it is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: page684

customer_reviews.title: Excellent broom
customer_reviews.text: My favorite broom. It works well and doesn't shed pieces. It is easy on the hands with the padded handle. I have bought two more - one for each floor.
customer_reviews.author: tharp83

customer_reviews.title: Stable, sturdy, very well-functioning
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy huge broom, sweeps off the deck great, stays stable, unlike our last broom which became unscrewed from the base every five sweeps.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best broom I've ever owned. I never thought there would be much of a difference between brooms, but the handle is solid, and the bristles are strong. I've only had it for a month or so, but it feels like this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: James Powell

customer_reviews.title: Quality broom
customer_reviews.text: Great broom, does the job. I'm 5'1" and it's a fine size for me. I can't recall if my hands land on the grip or not. It doesn't seem to matter.
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Beverley

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty and really big
customer_reviews.text: Awesome heavy duty broom!! Great for outdoors and big spaces.. must have!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Pajuelo

customer_reviews.title: In love with this broom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, perfect weight, perfect performance. In love with this broom from first sight, hope we have a long and happy future together.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Sweep the leg Johnny
customer_reviews.text: It's a broom and it works. That's pretty much it. Need to get to if dirt in your garage or on your patio, I'll basically guarantee that if you've got two arms this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J HowlandTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It’s just a broom
customer_reviews.text: Expected it to be really heavy and sturdy. It’s nothing extra.
customer_reviews.author: arkie

customer_reviews.title: Bristles Are Too Stiff - Terrible Broom
customer_reviews.text: A heavy well made broom that unfortunately falls flat as a useable broom. It does a lousy job sweeping and has been relegated to my backyard already! Not even good enough for the workroom floor! The bristles are so stiff that it's doesn't actually sweep the floor, but instead throws the debris across the floor, leaving behind the finer dust and debris. What happened to the soft bristle brushes of the past that Fuller and Home For The Blind sold?
customer_reviews.author: D. Grecco

customer_reviews.title: More of an outdoor than indoor broom
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't sweep very smoothly. Wanted more of an indoor than outdoor broom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best broom ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best broom ever! I never thought I would be excited about a cleaning product, but this thing is awesome. It's got a good weight to it, and two great grips on it. The bristles are nice and stiff, so it works really well. Buy this broom! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Joyce

customer_reviews.title: It is ok. But there is a extra part ...
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. But there is a extra part that was attached to the handle that has no use and no explanation as to what it is. I have spend over an hour trying to figure out how to use this extra part and could not figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P.

customer_reviews.title: ... to use on my hardwood floors but it's been great on my porch
customer_reviews.text: Too stiff to use on my hardwood floors but it's been great on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana CTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY BROOM TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: If it's possible to LOVE a broom, this is the one to have!! And I HATE sweeping! This dude makes it easy and there's no need to sweep once, only to have to sweep the same area again. Plus, they even delivered it on Saturday!
customer_reviews.author: woodrowsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom
customer_reviews.text: I really like this broom. I am using it outdoors for my concrete patio/pool area. I like the rubberized portion on the handle. Good grip. It will have to be stored upside down because there is no hole at the top of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Front runner for the Quidditch World Cup
customer_reviews.text: I managed to win the quidditch game for my house on this thing! Nice clean lines, good at taking corners, and as a bonus it cleans too!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Love the angle and the strong bristles
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom! The angling is great. The grip is comfortable. The bristles do not break off like those of a corn broom do. We have had the broom for several months now and it is still working like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Anathea

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful broom if you have animals
customer_reviews.text: This broom is great for my needs. We have 4 dogs and as well as sweeping up the dirt that they drag in, it also collects all of the dog hair. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Fuss

product_meta.title: Black & Decker 261019 Angle Broom
product_meta.description: Style Name:AngleAngled brace design keeps broom head from twisting out of place. Broom fibers are angled in order to reach into tight corners. Tips of the broom fibers are split to help sweep dirt and dust. Steel pole for durability and long life. Soft grip handle provides a comfortable and secure grip. Included Components: Broom
